acceptpage.name: AcceptPage
acceptpage.description: Grants permission to accept a page

activatecontactchannel.name: ActivateContactChannel
activatecontactchannel.description: Grants permission to activate a contact's contact channel

associatecontact.name: AssociateContact
associatecontact.description: Grants permission to use a contact in an escalation plan

createcontact.name: CreateContact
createcontact.description: Grants permission to create a contact

createcontactchannel.name: CreateContactChannel
createcontactchannel.description: Grants permission to create a contact channel for a contact

createrotation.name: CreateRotation
createrotation.description: Grants permission to create a rotation in an on-call schedule

createrotationoverride.name: CreateRotationOverride
createrotationoverride.description: Grants permission to create an override for a rotation in an on-call schedule

deactivatecontactchannel.name: DeactivateContactChannel
deactivatecontactchannel.description: Grants permission to deactivate a contact's contact channel

deletecontact.name: DeleteContact
deletecontact.description: Grants permission to delete a contact

deletecontactchannel.name: DeleteContactChannel
deletecontactchannel.description: Grants permission to delete a contact's contact channel

deleterotation.name: DeleteRotation
deleterotation.description: Grants permission to delete a rotation

deleterotationoverride.name: DeleteRotationOverride
deleterotationoverride.description: Grants permission to delete a rotation's rotation override

describeengagement.name: DescribeEngagement
describeengagement.description: Grants permission to describe an engagement

describepage.name: DescribePage
describepage.description: Grants permission to describe a page

getcontact.name: GetContact
getcontact.description: Grants permission to get a contact

getcontactchannel.name: GetContactChannel
getcontactchannel.description: Grants permission to get a contact's contact channel

getcontactpolicy.name: GetContactPolicy
getcontactpolicy.description: Grants permission to get a contact's resource policy

getrotation.name: GetRotation
getrotation.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an on-call rotation

getrotationoverride.name: GetRotationOverride
getrotationoverride.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an override in an on-call rotation

listcontactchannels.name: ListContactChannels
listcontactchannels.description: Grants permission to list all of a contact's contact channels

listcontacts.name: ListContacts
listcontacts.description: Grants permission to list all contacts

listengagements.name: ListEngagements
listengagements.description: Grants permission to list all engagements

listpagereceipts.name: ListPageReceipts
listpagereceipts.description: Grants permission to list all receipts of a page

listpageresolutions.name: ListPageResolutions
listpageresolutions.description: Grants permission to list the resolution path of an engagement

listpagesbycontact.name: ListPagesByContact
listpagesbycontact.description: Grants permission to list all pages sent to a contact

listpagesbyengagement.name: ListPagesByEngagement
listpagesbyengagement.description: Grants permission to list all pages created in an engagement

listpreviewrotationshifts.name: ListPreviewRotationShifts
listpreviewrotationshifts.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of shifts based on rotation configuration parameters

listrotationoverrides.name: ListRotationOverrides
listrotationoverrides.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of overrides currently specified for an on-call rotation

listrotationshifts.name: ListRotationShifts
listrotationshifts.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of rotation shifts in an on-call schedule

listrotations.name: ListRotations
listrotations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of on-call rotations

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to view a list of resource tags for a specified resource

putcontactpolicy.name: PutContactPolicy
putcontactpolicy.description: Grants permission to add a resource policy to a contact

sendactivationcode.name: SendActivationCode
sendactivationcode.description: Grants permission to send the activation code of a contact's contact channel

startengagement.name: StartEngagement
startengagement.description: Grants permission to start an engagement

stopengagement.name: StopEngagement
stopengagement.description: Grants permission to stop an engagement

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to the specified resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified resource

updatecontact.name: UpdateContact
updatecontact.description: Grants permission to update a contact

updatecontactchannel.name: UpdateContactChannel
updatecontactchannel.description: Grants permission to update a contact's contact channel

updaterotation.name: UpdateRotation
updaterotation.description: Grants permission to update the information specified for an on-call rotation
